attributes.action: enforce any laws charging anyone with treason the handing over of anymore powers to un/elected bodies outside the United Kingdom because parliament is soveriegn
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Members of parliament are elected by the British people to act in their name and not to surrender those powers or any say to un/elected bodies in Europe or elsewhere

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
